{{official|1=http://www.just.gva.es/pls/civisc/p_civis.municipios?codcat=46101}} | footnotes = }} '''Quart de les Valls''' is a [[Municipalities of Spain|municipality]] in the [[Comarques of the Valencian Community|''comarca'']] of [[Camp de Morvedre]] in the [[Valencia (autonomous community)|Valencian Community]], [[Spain]]. {{Camp de Morvedre}} [[Category:Municipalities in the Province of
